评论概述: Nice but didn’t get the correct color
评论详情: I ordered them hats as I realy like them thought I was getting a black one instead I got a brown one

My daughter and I like to wear beanies all year round. So I am always looking for cute ones that fit my alternative style and came across these. They are exactly like I expected. Cute. Lightweight. Distressed and comfy. My daughter even stole the blue one and won't take it off. 10/10 would recommend.
